name: taskmaster
0:
”Alexa, ask task master to add a task create presentation for next weekly meeting.”
”Alexa, ask task master to check open tasks.”
”Alexa, ask task master to check overdue tasks”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: task master
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Task Master enables you to organise and track your tasks assigned to different people. You can update status of tasks, check upcoming tasks as well as track overdue tasks. It is a tool for leaders to get organised without looking at your Monitors.
You can:
1. Add tasks and assign them to different names with target dates
2. Check overdue tasks
3. Check tasks assigned to certain individual
4. Check upcoming tasks (next 7 days).
5. Close tasks.
